about.title: About
about.p1: Welcome to my portfolio! I am a passionate programmer specializing in Python and C# backend development. With extensive experience in Python and C#, I have developed robust backend systems for various projects.
about.p2: Python is my go-to language for building applications due to its simplicity and versatility. I leverage its strengths and extensive libraries to create scalable and maintainable code.
about.p3: In addition to Python, I have a strong command over C# for backend development. Feel free to explore my portfolio and examples of my work. Let's create something amazing together!

cookie.p: Website uses cookies to provide a better user experience

header.motto: Embrace the logic, embrace the code

navigation.link1: Embrace the logic, embrace the code
